mapper.update: update l_trader set traderid=traderid ,tradercode=#{tradercode} ,tradername=#{tradername} ,provinceid=#{provinceid} ,cityid=#{cityid} ,countyid=#{countyid} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,traderaddress=#{traderaddress} ,postalcode=#{postalcode} ,artificialperson=#{artificialperson} ,artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} ,linkman=#{linkman} ,linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} ,telnumber=#{telnumber} ,faxnumber=#{faxnumber} ,traderurl=#{traderurl} ,bankname=#{bankname} ,bankaccno=#{bankaccno} ,arbala=#{arbala} ,prbala=#{prbala} ,apbala=#{apbala} ,ppbala=#{ppbala} ,remark=#{remark} ,tradernature=#{tradernature} ,buytype=#{buytype} ,mastercardnum=#{mastercardnum} ,vicecardnum=#{vicecardnum} ,traderkind=#{traderkind} ,creditcode=#{creditcode} ,taxregno=#{taxregno} ,taxnature=#{taxnature} ,businessrep=#{businessrep} ,businessscope=#{businessscope} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} where traderid=#{traderid}

update l_trader set traderid=traderid ,tradercode=#{tradercode} ,tradername=#{tradername} ,provinceid=#{provinceid} ,cityid=#{cityid} ,countyid=#{countyid} ,groupid=#{groupid} ,companyid=#{companyid} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} ,traderaddress=#{traderaddress} ,postalcode=#{postalcode} ,artificialperson=#{artificialperson} ,artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} ,linkman=#{linkman} ,linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} ,telnumber=#{telnumber} ,faxnumber=#{faxnumber} ,traderurl=#{traderurl} ,bankname=#{bankname} ,bankaccno=#{bankaccno} ,arbala=#{arbala} ,prbala=#{prbala} ,apbala=#{apbala} ,ppbala=#{ppbala} ,remark=#{remark} ,tradernature=#{tradernature} ,buytype=#{buytype} ,mastercardnum=#{mastercardnum} ,vicecardnum=#{vicecardnum} ,traderkind=#{traderkind} ,creditcode=#{creditcode} ,taxregno=#{taxregno} ,taxnature=#{taxnature} ,businessrep=#{businessrep} ,businessscope=#{businessscope} ,createuserid=#{createuserid} ,createtime=#{createtime} where 1=1 and traderid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and traderid =#{Where_Id} and traderid=#{Where_traderid} and tradercode=#{Where_tradercode} and tradername=#{Where_tradername} and provinceid=#{Where_provinceid} and cityid=#{Where_cityid} and countyid=#{Where_countyid} and groupid=#{Where_groupid} and companyid=#{Where_companyid} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid} and traderaddress=#{Where_traderaddress} and postalcode=#{Where_postalcode} and artificialperson=#{Where_artificialperson} and artificialidcard=#{Where_artificialidcard} and linkman=#{Where_linkman} and linkmanidcard=#{Where_linkmanidcard} and telnumber=#{Where_telnumber} and faxnumber=#{Where_faxnumber} and traderurl=#{Where_traderurl} and bankname=#{Where_bankname} and bankaccno=#{Where_bankaccno} and arbala=#{Where_arbala} and prbala=#{Where_prbala} and apbala=#{Where_apbala} and ppbala=#{Where_ppbala} and remark=#{Where_remark} and tradernature=#{Where_tradernature} and buytype=#{Where_buytype} and mastercardnum=#{Where_mastercardnum} and vicecardnum=#{Where_vicecardnum} and traderkind=#{Where_traderkind} and creditcode=#{Where_creditcode} and taxregno=#{Where_taxregno} and taxnature=#{Where_taxnature} and businessrep=#{Where_businessrep} and businessscope=#{Where_businessscope} and createuserid=#{Where_createuserid} and createtime=#{Where_createtime}

select count(*) from l_trader t where 1=1 and t.traderid=#{traderid} and t.traderid!=#{noid} and t.tradercode=#{tradercode} and t.tradername like #{tradername} and t.provinceid=#{provinceid} and t.cityid=#{cityid} and t.countyid=#{countyid} and t.groupid=#{groupid} and t.companyid=#{companyid} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and t.traderaddress=#{traderaddress} and t.postalcode=#{postalcode} and t.artificialperson=#{artificialperson} and t.artificialidcard=#{artificialidcard} and t.linkman=#{linkman} and t.linkmanidcard=#{linkmanidcard} and t.telnumber=#{telnumber} and t.faxnumber=#{faxnumber} and t.traderurl=#{traderurl} and t.bankname=#{bankname} and t.bankaccno=#{bankaccno} and t.arbala=#{arbala} and t.prbala=#{prbala} and t.apbala=#{apbala} and t.ppbala=#{ppbala} and t.remark=#{remark} and t.tradernature=#{tradernature} and t.buytype=#{buytype} and t.mastercardnum=#{mastercardnum} and t.vicecardnum=#{vicecardnum} and t.traderkind=#{traderkind} and t.creditcode=#{creditcode} and t.taxregno=#{taxregno} and t.taxnature=#{taxnature} and t.businessrep=#{businessrep} and t.businessscope=#{businessscope} and t.createuserid=#{createuserid} and t.createtime=#{createtime}
select count(*) from l_trader WHERE 1=1 and tradername=#{tradername} and traderid!=#{traderid} and graindepotid!=#{graindepotid}
select * from l_trader where traderid not in ( select refid from l_blanklist where spstate!=2 and graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and blanklisttype=2) and graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
select count(*) from l_trader where traderid not in ( select refid from l_blanklist where spstate!=2 and graindepotid=#{graindepotid} and blanklisttype=2) and graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
